comp.sql:
SELECT
`LastName`,
 `FirstName`,
 `City`,
 `PersonID`,
 `Address`,
 `id`
FROM Persons
WHERE ({{input_search.value?.trim()}} = '' OR (`LastName` LIKE '%{{input_search.value?.trim()}}%'))
LIMIT {{table_data.pageSize}} OFFSET {{table_data.pageOffset}}

SELECT count(`id`) AS total_record
FROM Persons
WHERE ({{input_search.value?.trim()}} = '' OR (`LastName` LIKE '%{{input_search.value?.trim()}}%'))
